text: Q.27 Consider the following statements: Statement-I: If a binary tree has exactly 2 children for each internal node, then pre-order and post- order traversals can be used to construct a unique binary tree. Statement-II: There is no fixed notion of an inorder traversal for a generic tree which is not a binary tree. Find the number of correct statements. Â®: VIEW Anwser || COPY || MARK
